body:
Hey my friend is having trouble with getting onto the Avicus website, it isn't a recognised site for him. 

I remember once there was a topic and Funky posted some alternate web addresses if anyone knows and could share them i would be grateful. Thanks!
body_tagged:
Hey my friend is having trouble with getting onto the Avicus website, it isn't a recognised site for him. 

I remember once there was a topic and Funky posted some alternate web addresses if anyone knows and could share them i would be grateful. Thanks!
title: Alternative web addresses

replies.body:
Here are some.
http://avicus.net
https://avicus.net
http://mczone.co
https://mczone.co

Also, I realized you can connect to the avicus website with all those nebula rotations and, possibly for other gamemodes as well. For example http://nebula01.avic.us takes you to the avicus website.
replies.body_tagged:
Here are some.
http://avicus.net
https://avicus.net
http://mczone.co
https://mczone.co

Also, I realized you can connect to the avicus website with all those nebula rotations and, possibly for other gamemodes as well. For example http://nebula01.avic.us takes you to the avicus website.

replies.body: Sort of although I heard that there were some more obscure ones as none of these worked for my friend
replies.body_tagged: Sort of although I heard that there were some more obscure ones as none of these worked for my friend

replies.body: The reason they didn't work is because the master DNS system resolves all of these domains to the same IP address. If one of these didn't work, none will.
replies.body_tagged: The reason they didn't work is because the master DNS system resolves all of these domains to the same IP address. If one of these didn't work, none will.

replies.body: Fari enough but can you explain to me why some people's internet doesn't recognise Avicus as a website?
replies.body_tagged: Fari enough but can you explain to me why some people's internet doesn't recognise Avicus as a website?

reply_to.body: The reason they didn't work is because the master DNS system resolves all of these domains to the same IP address. If one of these didn't work, none will.
reply_to.body_tagged: The reason they didn't work is because the master DNS system resolves all of these domains to the same IP address. If one of these didn't work, none will.

replies.body: It really shouldn't work that way...I couldn't explain that to you.  There isn't a good reason, but there are several possible (albeit improbable) causes.
replies.body_tagged: It really shouldn't work that way...I couldn't explain that to you.  There isn't a good reason, but there are several possible (albeit improbable) causes.

replies.body: Yeah there must be something though because 3 people in my team have the same problem
replies.body_tagged: Yeah there must be something though because 3 people in my team have the same problem

replies.body: It might not do anything but I would suggest that they change their DNS servers to OpenDNS.  It's not an easy process but it's worth it.  It speeds up your internet, too.
replies.body_tagged: It might not do anything but I would suggest that they change their DNS servers to OpenDNS.  It's not an easy process but it's worth it.  It speeds up your internet, too.
